amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the plan where oil and gas leasing would be inconsistent with the goals of the Paris Climate Accords.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit the plan where oil and gas leasing would be inconsistent with the goals of the Paris Climate Accords.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 69).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 69).
